steps: step 2: Click on link settings -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/settings'
step 3: Click on link scriptRepositories -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-project'
step 4: Click on link connectGitRepository -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/git-test-project/setup'
step 7: Edit project details and save changes in SauceDemo
step 8: Click on button object -> Navigate to page '/team/320312/project/434641/test-design/test-cases'
step 11: Click on div object -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-design/test-suites'
step 13: Click on div testSuites -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/grid'
step 16: Enter input value in input name
step 20: Enter input value in textarea katalonCommand
step 32: Click on link settings -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/settings'
step 33: Click on link scriptRepositories -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-project'
step 34: Click on link demoTargetDirectory -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-project/*'
step 36: Click on button delete -> Navigate to page ''
step 37: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
